Paul's Journal

Things To Do At The ApacheCon US Hackathon Next Week

Since Garrett did it, here is my list:

1. Try to commit the recent mod_cache patches. 1 2

2. Crazy Lua+httpd integration plan. Something kind of like mod_magnet for ligty, but also replacing the httpd config subsystem.

3. A new project to build an Automatic Partitioned Replicated Object Storage system built on top of BerkeleyDB.

4. A new project to build a DFS that is a cross between MogileFS and what Bloglines has built internally.

Being realistic, I think I can do #1 without a problem. The rest are turning into lots of talk, and far off goals. Maybe I should just concentrate on one of them and get it to a usable state…..
